purpose: The email is a call for papers and workshop/tutorial proposals for the 33rd IEEE International Conference on Software Analysis, Evolution, and Reengineering (SANER 2026), scheduled for March 17-20, 2026, in Limassol, Cyprus. It invites high-quality submissions of original and unpublished research results in various areas related to software analysis, evolution, and reengineering. The email outlines the topics of interest, submission instructions, and important deadlines for different tracks, including research, industrial, short papers, and workshops. Additionally, it mentions a special journal issue for selected papers and provides details on the evaluation criteria for submissions.

infos:
